header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Morse code, texting, results day, phones, memory, glass water bottles, amazon delivery, eBay, new shoes, food, emoji's, Vodafone, directions, stationery, pens, university campus, food shopping, student finance, vegetables/ meals, money,
header.activity: Father and daughter converse on the way to dinner with family
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, advising, anecdote telling, making arrangements
